projects.title: Sarah
projects.description: An interactive terminal application using the binary search algorithm to find a target value specified by the user.

projects.title: Blackhole Simulation
projects.description: This is an animation that predominantly replicates a black hole so to speak using HTML5 Canvas.

projects.title: Interactive Starfield
projects.description: A seemingly endless interactive starfield animation using HTML5 Canvas by simply manipulating an array.

projects.title: Todo List

projects.title: Pillbox
projects.description: This application is intended to help keep a log of prescription or over-the-counter medication and documents the users feelings with a simple daily log.
